category.description: If specified, all sound events from this category will be prevented from being heard by the entity that has the power. Can accept `"ambient"`, `"blocks"`, `"hostile"`, `"master"`, `"music"`, `"neutral"`, `"players"`, `"records"`, `"voice"` and `"weather"`.
category.markdownDescription: If specified, all sound events from this category will be prevented from being heard by the entity that has the power. Can accept `"ambient"`, `"blocks"`, `"hostile"`, `"master"`, `"music"`, `"neutral"`, `"players"`, `"records"`, `"voice"` and `"weather"`.

categories.description: If specified, all sound events from these categories will be prevented from being heard by the entity that has the power. Can accept `"ambient"`, `"blocks"`, `"hostile"`, `"master"`, `"music"`, `"neutral"`, `"players"`, `"records"`, `"voice"` and `"weather"`.
categories.markdownDescription: If specified, all sound events from these categories will be prevented from being heard by the entity that has the power. Can accept `"ambient"`, `"blocks"`, `"hostile"`, `"master"`, `"music"`, `"neutral"`, `"players"`, `"records"`, `"voice"` and `"weather"`.

sound.description: If specified, this sound event will be prevented from being heard by the entity that has the power.
sound.markdownDescription: If specified, this sound event will be prevented from being heard by the entity that has the power.

sounds.description: If specified, these sound events will be prevented from being heard by the entity that has the power.
sounds.markdownDescription: If specified, these sound events will be prevented from being heard by the entity that has the power.

whitelist.description: If specified, these sound events will be exempt from being prevented.
whitelist.markdownDescription: If specified, these sound events will be exempt from being prevented.
